description.short: Professional repair and maintenance for all major household appliances.
description.long: Our Appliance Repair Service provides expert diagnosis, repair, and maintenance for refrigerators, dishwashers, washing machines, dryers, ovens, microwaves, and more. We use quality parts and offer same-day service for urgent repairs to get your appliances working efficiently again.

features.title: Comprehensive Appliance Coverage
features.description: Repair and maintenance for refrigerators, dishwashers, washers, dryers, ovens, microwaves, and more.

features.title: Expert Diagnosis
features.description: Professional troubleshooting to identify the root cause of appliance issues quickly and accurately.

features.title: Quality Parts & Service
features.description: Use of manufacturer-approved parts and professional tools for reliable, long-lasting repairs.

features.title: Same-Day Service
features.description: Emergency repairs available with same-day service for urgent appliance breakdowns.

features.title: Preventive Maintenance
features.description: Regular maintenance plans to extend appliance lifespan and prevent costly breakdowns.

features.title: Warranty Protection
features.description: All repairs come with a comprehensive warranty on parts and labor for your peace of mind.

faq.question: What appliances do you repair?
faq.answer: We repair all major household appliances including refrigerators, dishwashers, washing machines, dryers, ovens, ranges, microwaves, garbage disposals, and more.

faq.question: Do you offer same-day service?
faq.answer: Yes, we offer same-day emergency service for urgent repairs. Contact us early in the day for best availability.

faq.question: What warranty do you provide on repairs?
faq.answer: We provide a 90-day warranty on all parts and labor, with extended warranties available for premium parts.

faq.question: Do you charge for diagnostic visits?
faq.answer: We offer free diagnostic visits for repairs we complete. If you choose not to proceed with the repair, there is a diagnostic fee.
